name: ONE BULLET (mrbru3)
description:
Made by Nathan and Matthew for GMTK 2019 game jam!

Fight and survive against endless waves of enemies. You are equipped with only one bullet that must be retrieved after firing it! Pick up the various power ups in the level to enhance your bullets capabilities as well as replenish your health!

Controls - 

W, A, S, D to Move

LeftClick to shoot

RightClick to detonate the bullet early

Shift to dash

How to play-

Shoot your bullet, when it lands try to pick it up while avoiding enemy fire

Fly around the map to pick up items such as weapon upgrades and health packs
